item.author: Joe
item.description: The day before yesterday, i listened over the fifth episode of the first season of Friends. And this episode told three little stories: Joey pursued his ex-girlfriend again; Chandler and Phoebe broke up together; Ross and Rachel went to laundry. The first story began/started with Joey met/run into his ex-girlfriend which became more beautiful and sexy than before in the Center Park. So he wanted to win her heart again.
